transcript: your brain is wired to be rewarded for things and so you are doing things that reward you and if you're like well I don't like doing anything that's impossible everything we do is because we've been warded for doing things like that in the past and we predict that doing things like we did in the past that reward us reward us again in the future and I've lived my life through a series of Rapid iterations not trying to pick the right thing even when I was starting my first business I was between frozen yogurt test prep and a gym why were those the things I was like well I was pretty good at taking tests in college I like frozen yogurt I mean it sounds simple but like everybody likes something I'll do Fitness because I like Fitness at the very least I'll do something I enjoy I'm a big fan of being directionally correct rather than absolutely correct
